title: connectable electrical installation battery
fullText:
battery with the primary purpose of supplying circuits not related to either the propulsion of the vehicle or supply to equipment intended for compliance with vehicle/road transport requirements
Note 1 to entry: A connectable electrical installation battery may be charged by the charging system for the vehicle battery and may also have other charging facilities.
Note 2 to entry: A connectable electrical installation may be referred to as a house battery, general light and power battery or service battery.
